botMessages.message: {!Chat_Queue}
Transferring
transferred.
Goodbye! Click the "End Chat" button to end this chat
It looks like there was an error while I was transferring you. Please try again in a moment.
If the issue persists, contact Customer Care at {!Brand_Email} to speak with one of our specialists.
Let's get you over to one of our agents.
So that I can assist you better, please tell me how I can help.
I'm going to get one of our human agents to assist you. One moment.
Let's get you to someone who can help.
It looks like nobody is available at the moment.
I'm connecting you now.
Was I able to resolve your question?
What other questions can I help with?
That's good to hear. Thanks for your feedback!
Oh no! Would you like me to get a human agent who can help?
What can I do better next time?
Thank you, I appreciate your feedback.
Sure thing, one moment.
I'm sorry. Let me get a case started for you so an agent can follow up with you.
Template for case creation, customer specific
I'm the {!Brand} digital assistant, and I can help you with any questions you may have.
{!RandomResponse}
No problem!
Goodbye, thanks for chatting!
I didn't quite understand that. Please rephrase your question below, or pick one of these topics:
Sure, ask me anything.
It looks like I'll need to get you to an agent for additional support.
How can I help you?
{!RandomResponse}
It looks like I'll need to get you in touch with someone to better assist you with this.

Questions about a specific product? Ask for an agent below, and I'll get you someone who can help.
I'll be happy to get you more information on your order.
You can find all of your order's up-to-date information ^{"t":"link","v":"here","url":"{!Formatted_Order_Status_Link}"}^.
I can help with that! You'll be able to find your order number on the email we sent with your order confirmation.
Let me know if you found it, and we'll continue.
Please type your order number below, or if you don't know it, select "Don't know it".

retryMessages.message: Please check your order number and try again. It'll have 8 digits.

botMessages.message: What was the email address you used to place the order?

retryMessages.message: Please check your email address and try again. Example: john@gmail.com

botMessages.message: Did you have any other questions about your order's status?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: I need help with my order

botStepConditions.rightOperandValue: I need help with my order

botMessages.message: What kind of returns questions did you have?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: I have a question about my return

botStepConditions.rightOperandValue: I have a question about my return

botMessages.message: Let's get your return started.
What questions did you have?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: When do I get my refund?

botStepConditions.rightOperandValue: When do I get my refund?

botMessages.message: You can find info on eligibility, process, and general guidelines for returns ^{"t":"link","v":"here","url":"{!Return_Questions_URL}"}^.
Once we receive your return, please allow up to 14 business days for us to process your refund.
It can take up to 5 additional business days after the refund is processed for your bank to credit the funds back to your account.
Hi, I'm the {!Brand} Digital Assistant.
First, I'll need to get some information from you.
It doesn't look like any agents are available. Let's create a ticket so one of our agents can follow up with you.
Got it! In a few words, how can we help you?
May I have the best email address to reach you?

retryMessages.message: Please check your email address and try again. For example, johnsmith@gmail.com

botMessages.message: Can I have your first and last name?
May I please have the full billing address on the order? For example: 123 Fashion Ave NY NY, 10121
Thanks! I'll connect you now.
The name I have for this email is {!First_Name} {!Last_Name}, is that right?
All of our latest promotions ^{"t":"link","v":"can be found here.","url":"{!Promotions_URL}"}^
In order to best serve you, I'll need a valid email address. If you need further assistance, please reach out to us at {!Brand_Email} or give us a call at $brandPhone.
Thanks! I'll connect you now.
Thanks! I've created a case for you: {!Case_Number}.
An agent will follow up with you via email as soon as possible.
Thanks! An agent will follow up with you via email soon as possible.
Sure, ask me anything.
Once we receive your order, you have a window of 30 minutes in which you can edit or cancel it.
If it's within that time frame, you can make any necessary changes. You can also follow the link in your order confirmation email.
Otherwise, you'll need to wait until the shipment has been delivered to take any further action.
It looks like I'll need to get you in touch with someone to better assist you with this.
Thanks! You can finish up your return by ^{"t":"link","v":"following this link.","url":"{!Formatted_Order_Status_Link}"}^.

Once there, select the option of returning items in store or online. If in store, you must print out the packing slip in order for your return to be processed. If online, select the items you’d like to add to the return to continue.
If you have any issues, you can ask me for help below.
It looks like there was an error while I was transferring you, but I did create a case on your behalf.
One of our customer care reps will be following up with you as soon as possible.

botDialogs.description: Construct and present expandable minicards to the user, separated by order number
botDialogs.label: bot_orderStatus_presentShipments

botMessages.message: Due to an increase in demand, we are experiencing delivery times that may be longer than normal.
You will receive an email once your order ships. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
How can I help you today? You can ask me a question, or select from one of the topics below.
How else can I help you today? You can ask me a question, or select from one of the topics below.
We're currently experiencing shipping delays. Would you like to hear more?
